doc.title: Chi non rischia non beve champagne
doc.plot: No risk No champagne, tells the stories of young women who leave the Ukraine to find their fortune in the West. Some hope to find a husband. Some others are convinced they have a contact for a real job. Some are ready to try absolutely anything, because, as an old Russian proverb says, "Who takes no risks, drinks no champagne". None expected the hell they found.
